description.what: Joined CVIT Lab IIT Hyderabad as a
description.info: Working under Dr. CV Jawahar and Dr. Chetan Arora on object tracking using geometric approaches.
Implemented pivoted document length normalization along with other code patches under the incubator program at gensim making me one of their top contributors.
Worked for implementing a telegram chatbot for ICOs based on custom built intent/slot models and for attribute searching in surveillance videos using a classifier along with darknet/YOLOv3.!
With BTech in Electronics And Communication
Worked on a data visualization tool in QGIS for the employees of Atkins.
Worked with Dr. Deivalakshmi in image contrast enhancement using dynamic stochastic resonance.
